onChange.script:
#Move the row data to the edit data any time the row id changes
	self.custom.edit_data = self.params.row_data

config.script:
#system.perspective.print("New Service Button Pressed")
	#Send the message to refresh the table
	messageType = 'refreshServicesDetail'
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType)

### Declare parameters
	project = "HMS" 
	row_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.row_id
		
	## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
	if (row_id is None) or (int(row_id) < 0):
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print("Row ID Error")
	else:
		valid = True
		system.perspective.print("Data Valid")
			
	### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
	if valid:
		try:
			#Delete the Case Note Association before deleting the service
			path = "Participants/Services/ServicesDetailDeleteAssociations"
			parameters = {"service_id":row_id}
			Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
			path = "Participants/Services/ServicesDetailDelete"
			parameters = {"row_id":row_id}
			Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
			#system.perspective.print("Delete Service")
			##### Refresh the table
			#if Refresh:	
			#	system.perspective.print("Query Success")
			#else:
				#system.perspective.print("Query Fail")
				#system.perspective.print(Refresh)
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Service Deleted successfully")
			system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshServicesDetail", payload={}, scope="session")
			
		except:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")	
	else:
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")

self.view.params.row_data.employee_id = self.session.custom.loggedInStaffEmployeeID
	self.view.params.row_data.enrollment_id = -1

	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.employee_id = -1 #self.view.custom.edit_data.employee_id
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.enrollment_id = -1
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.time_created = system.date.now()

import traceback
	try:
		project = "HMS"
		### Declare parameters 
		
		time_created = self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.time_created
		user_name = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
#		participant_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.participant_id
		employee_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.employee_id
		enrollment_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.enrollment_id
	
		## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
		errorMessage = ""
		if (employee_id is None) or (int(employee_id) < 0):
			valid = False
			errorMessage = "Please select Employee"
			system.perspective.print("Employee ID Error")
		elif (enrollment_id is None) or (int(enrollment_id) < 0):
			valid = False
			errorMessage = "Please select a Program"
			system.perspective.print("Enrollment ID Error")
		else:
			## check for any suspended Participants
			## check for matching enrollments
			suspendedParticipants = []
			participantsWithMissingPrograms = []
			if self.view.params.participantList is not None and len(self.view.params.participantList) > 0:
				for participant in self.view.params.participantList:
					if participant.value['suspended'] == True:
						suspendedParticipants.append(participant.value['firstName'] + " " + participant.value['lastName'])
			if len(suspendedParticipants) > 0:
				valid = False
				parameters = {"time_created":time_created,"allParticipantsList":self.view.params.participantList,
								"suspendedParticipantNames":suspendedParticipants,"employee_id":employee_id,"enrollment_id":enrollment_id, 
								"user_name":user_name}
				system.perspective.openPopup("BatchSaveProgramWarning", "Participants/Batch_Program/Cards/Edit/SaveProgramWarning", params = parameters, showCloseIcon = False, resizable = False, draggable = False, overlayDismiss = True, modal  = True)
			else:
				valid = True
				system.perspective.print("Programs Detail Data Valid")
		
		### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
		if valid:
			### Check if the user is creating new data
			if self.view.params.participantList is not None and len(self.view.params.participantList) > 0:
				for participant in self.view.params.participantList:
					participant_id = participant.value['participantId']
					userName = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
					## add a program to the participant
					path = "Participants/Enrollments/AddSelectedEnrollments_BatchPrograms"
					parameters = {"participantId": participant_id, "programId":enrollment_id, "timeCreated":time_created,"employeeId":employee_id, "userName":userName}
					system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters)		
				#system.perspective.print("Insert data")
				
				self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Programs added successfully.")
				## clear the selected participants
				system.perspective.sendMessage("clearParticipants", payload={}, scope="session")
				## clear services selection
				self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.employee_id = ''
				self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.enrollment_id = -1
			else:
				self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Please select at least one participant.")
				
		else:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage(errorMessage)
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Batch Programs")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")

#send message to batch services to execute insert loop - Participants/Services/Batch/Cards/Participant_Select>root container
	message = 'updateServices'
	payload = self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params
	payload['comment'] = self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row2").props.params.comment
	
	system.perspective.sendMessage(message, payload)
	system.util.getLogger('Batch Services').info(str(payload))

props.text: Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving.

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.meta.visible = False

messageHandlers.script:
# implement your handler here
	addSuspended = payload['allow_suspended'] 
	time_created = self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.time_created
	user_name = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
	employee_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.employee_id
	enrollment_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.enrollment_id
	project = "HMS"
	if self.view.params.participantList is not None and len(self.view.params.participantList) > 0:
		noOfServicesAdded = 0
		for participant in self.view.params.participantList:
			if addSuspended == False and participant.value['suspended'] == True:
				pass
			else:
				participant_id = participant.value['participantId']
				userName = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
				## add a program to the participant
				path = "Participants/Enrollments/AddSelectedEnrollments_BatchPrograms"
				parameters = {"participantId": participant_id, "programId":enrollment_id, "timeCreated":time_created,"employeeId":employee_id, "userName":userName}
				system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters)	
		#system.perspective.print("Insert data")

		if addSuspended == True:
			self.getChild("root Actions").getChild("Label").showMessage("Program added successfully.")
		else:
			self.getChild("root Actions").getChild("Label").showMessage("Programs added for participants excluding suspended.")
		## clear the selected participants
		system.perspective.sendMessage("clearParticipants", payload={}, scope="session")
		## clear services selection
		self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.employee_id = ''
		self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.enrollment_id = -1

# implement your handler here
